title: Sarajevo Celebrates WWI Centennial With Joy And The Macabre
teaser: Saturday marks 100 years since the Archduke Franz Ferdinand was assassinated in Sarajevo. NPR's Scott Simon talks with correspondent Ari Shapiro about how Sarajevans are commemorating the event.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
